io.spine.server.integration

Class ExternalMessages

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.integration.ExternalMessages

  • @Internal
public final class ExternalMessages
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for working with external messages.

      • of

        public static ExternalMessage of(io.spine.core.Event event,
                                 io.spine.core.BoundedContextName origin)
        Wraps the instance of Event into an ExternalMessage.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to wrap
        origin - the name of the bounded context in which the event was created
        Returns:
        the external message wrapping the given event

      • asShardedMessage

        public static ShardedMessage asShardedMessage(ExternalMessage value)
        Unpacks the given ExternalMessage into a ShardedMessage.

        Callees of this method should ensure that the given external message indeed wraps an instance of ShardedMessage, before calling this method. A ClassCastException is thrown otherwise.

        Parameters:
        value - the value to unpack
        Returns:
        the unpacked value
